Dictionary.description:
-- Definition -- The application schema that the record complies with.
-- Description -- NOTE A data set provided by an MS may consist of some sites that comply with only the Simple application schema, and others that comply with the Natura2000 application schema.

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Sites dataset is compliant with the simple application schema.
Definition.name: simple

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Sites dataset is compliant with the full application schema.
Definition.name: full

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Sites dataset is compliant with the natura2000 application schema.
Definition.name: natura2000
